fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
AEFISA is involved with different issues including: 
Plant Protection Products, Biocides, Fertilisers, Biostimulants, Plant Health, Human Health, Environmental issues, Chemical industry issues (such as REACH, CLP, BREF, Stockolm and Rotterdam Conventions, etc.).
organisation_name: Asociación Española de Fitosanitarios y Sanidad Ambiental (AEFISA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: AEFISA is member of the Catalan Business Federation of the Chemical Sector (FEDEQUIM-Federación Empresarial Catalana del Sector Químico).
goals__remit: AEFISA is an SME's association representing 14 national companies in Spain, involved in the plant protection sector and placing plant protection products in the UE market (mainly in southern and central zones).
